/** * The entity state interface defines methods that must be implemented * by components that store information about entity declarations, as well as by * entity validator that will need to validate attributes of type entity. * * @xerces.internal * * @author Elena Litani, IBM * @version $Id: EntityState.java,v 1.6 2004/10/04 22:07:41 mrglavas Exp $ */
